bwwExcerpt: On the opening night in Minneapolis, we were treated to an outstanding performance by Matthew Michael Janisse in the role of Beetlejuice. He had the audience in stitches, establishing a fantastic connection with the character and displaying great chemistry with the rest of the cast.
rejectionReasoning: openai: The review discusses a performance in Minneapolis, indicating it is not about the current Broadway run.; kimi: The review explicitly states it covers the 'opening night in Minneapolis,' indicating this is a touring or regional production, not the current Broadway run in New York City.
